snippet.title: Stocks Maintain Slow Ascent
snippet.description:
Stocks Maintain Slow Ascent
By A. Teymour Golsorkhi 04:53 PM EDT 08/27/04
The Dow gains 22 points while the Nasdaq adds 9. For the week, the Dow gains 0.8%, the Nasdaq 1.3%.
http://www.thestreet.com/story/10180388/1/stocks-maintain-slow-ascent.html
